style: anchor: sunlit_roman_empire, imperial_toga, laurel_wreath, golden_horse; must_keep: laurel_wreath, imperial_purple_trim, golden_stallion, marble_arena. global_style: classical painterly realism, warm amber sunlight, soft film grain, high-detail fabric and metal textures, naturalistic human and animal anatomy, cinematic wide framing
negative_prompt: no modern technology (phones, cars, watches), no anachronistic clothing (jeans, modern helmets), no fantasy elements (wings, glowing runes), no futuristic architecture, avoid anime/cartoon stylization, no modern tattoos or piercings

characters.name: emperor_marcus_aurelius
characters.description: male, age 50s–60s, Mediterranean/olive skin tone, short curly salt-and-pepper hair, trimmed grey beard, lean stoic physique; wearing a white woolen toga with purple imperial border and gold fibula, simple laurel wreath crown, worn leather sandals, subtle antiqued bronze signet ring, visible weathered facial lines and classical Roman profile

characters.name: commodus
characters.description: male, age 18–25, Mediterranean/olive skin tone, dark wavy hair kept short, clean-shaven, athletic youthful build; wearing a fitted tunic with purple trim and embroidered hem, simple leather riding boots, leather riding gloves, thin bronze armlet, carries no weapons, posture alert and upright

characters.name: aurea_stallion
characters.description: large adult stallion, gleaming golden coat (sunset-gold), flowing flaxen mane and tail, strong muscular neck and legs, classical Roman riding tack: dark brown leather bridle and breastplate with gold and bronze ornamentation, leather saddle with purple cloth saddle blanket, clean hooves, noble equine proportions

locations.name: imperial_arena
locations.description: open sun-drenched arena within the imperial palace: fine pale sand floor, surrounding low marble colonnades and steps, red and purple imperial banners, carved stone reliefs on walls, warm amber late-afternoon light, scattered laurel trees casting dappled shade, worn patina on stone surfaces

locations.name: palace_sprawling_grounds
locations.description: expansive formal grounds: rolling lawns, native wildflowers in soft colors, cypress and olive trees, meandering tiled paths and low stone walls, classical statues and fountains with aged bronze, horizon bathed in twilight amber, naturalistic landscaping with Mediterranean flora
